user_review: Interesting food concept where you combine every comfort food ingredient wIthin a burrito-like wrap. Can't make it into a habit though.

An interesting concept of a burrito like / fajita like / panini like sandwich. It's actually pretty good and I thought the smallest size was a good value with a drink and fries. Â I made my wrap with mayonnaise, ground beef, bacon, cheddar cheese, and olives. It was pretty good!
